title: Great Depression: Global Economic Crisis and Response

vocab.definition: Severe worldwide economic downturn from 1929 to late 1930s
Sudden dramatic decline in stock market values
Series of programs to combat the Great Depression in the US
Condition of being without work despite seeking employment
Economic theory advocating government intervention during recessions

teachingNotes: Analyze the global nature of the crisis and various governmental responses. Connect to modern economic policies.

sample.question: What was the severe worldwide economic downturn of the 1930s?

truefalse.question: The New Deal was a series of programs to combat the Great Depression.

multiplechoice.question: What economic theory advocates government intervention during recessions?

fillintheblank.question: Being without work despite seeking employment is called ________.
